text: The 2015 VTV Cup Championship will be the 12th staging of the international tournament. The tournament will be held at the Bạc Liêu Gymnasium in Bạc Liêu, Vietnam. ==Pool composition== 6 teams are set to participate at the tournament. * (hosts) * Nanjing University * Liaoning Volleyball Club * April 25 Sports Club * * ==Preliminary round== {| class="infobox bordered" |- |width=15px bgcolor="#ccffcc"| ||Qualified for the Semifinals |} |} |} |} |} |} |} Fixtures: Thể Thao Việt Nam ==Final round== ===Bracket=== ===Semifinals=== |} ===5th place=== |} ===3rd place=== |} ===Final=== |} ==Final standing== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" !width=40|Rank !width=180|Team |- align=center | |style="text-align:left;"| |-align=center | |style="text-align:left;"| Liaoning V.C. |-align=center | |style="text-align:left;"| April 25 S.C. |- align=center |4 |style="text- align:left;"| |- align=center |5 |style="text-align:left;"| Nanjing University |- align=center |6 |style="text-align:left;"| |} |} ==Awards== *Most Valuable Player : Jong Jin Sim *Best Outside Spikers : Chatchu-on Moksri : Ajcharaporn Kongyot *Best Setter : Lao Meiqi *Best Opposite Spiker : Ju Un Hyang *Best Middle Blockers : Thatdao Nuekjang : Nguyễn Thị Ngọc Hoa *Best Libero : Gong Meizi *Miss VTV Cup 2015 : Nguyễn Linh Chi ==References== Category:VTV International Women's Volleyball Cup VTV Cup VTV Cup
title: 2015 VTV International Women's Volleyball Cup
